Is sports the biggest thing for colored people?

I notice that basketball has the highest percentage of players of color and coaches of color but baseball has the lowest percentage of players of color and football has the the lowest percentage of coaches of color. I wonder why football has the Lowest percentage of coaches but so many players. This impacts me and my community because it shows how sports is really popular for the culture of colored people.

This situation impacts the community of the author.
